title: Writer/Producer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Writer/Producer Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Supervise the top to bottom process of Producing on-air promo spots and presentations (write, edit, music, VO, coordinating and producing shoots, etc.). Research and present original ideas for spots and campaigns   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
